definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Book of Exodus/Second Book of Moses

pinyin: Ai1 ji2 gu3 wu4 xue2 zhe3

definition: (bird species of China) Egyptian nightjar (Caprimulgus aegyptius)

sentences.english: It is one of the famous paintings in the ancient Eygptian history.
sentences.chinese: 這是古老的埃及史上最著名的油畫之一。
宏正自動科技是埃及爲太陽。

sentences.english: An Egyptian slave given to Abraham by the Pharaoh of Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 埃及的法老給了亞伯拉罕一個僕婢。

sentences.english: And I will bring again the captivity of Egypt, and will cause them to return into the land of Pathros, into the land of their habitation; and they shall be there a base kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 我必叫埃及被擄的人回來，使他們歸回本地巴忒羅。

sentences.english: Lippi overlooks last summer's Confederations Cup, in which his team lost to Egypt and Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 裏皮回想去在聯合會杯上他的隊伍輸給埃及和巴西后。

sentences.english: The best preserved temple of Egyptian antiquity in Edfu.
sentences.chinese: 埃德福神廟是埃及至今保存最完好的神廟。

sentences.english: It was originally used medicinally by the Egyptians.
sentences.chinese: 它最初被埃及人用於醫藥方面。

sentences.english: And Joseph went throughout the land of Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 約瑟就出去巡行埃及地。

sentences.english: The Egyptian sacred scarab is a dung beetle.
sentences.chinese: 埃及聖甲蟲其實就是蜣螂。

sentences.english: An ancient city of northern Egypt east of Alexandria. It was the site of a great temple honoring Serapis.
sentences.chinese: 坎努帕斯埃及北部一座古老城市，位於亞歷山大東部。

sentences.english: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.
sentences.chinese: 我們投降埃及人和亞述人，爲要得糧喫飽。

sentences.english: Not one of these conditions obtains in Egytian art.
sentences.chinese: 在埃及藝術中不存在這些條件中的任何一種。

sentences.english: In Egypt, there have been reports of street protests over the cost of tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 在埃及也有報導過，因爲番茄價格而有人上街抗議。

sentences.english: The Israelites vow that they'll obey  Exodus 24:3, also 7b.
sentences.chinese: 在《出埃及記》第24章第3節詩7b中。

sentences.english: Military strongmen have ruled Egypt since 1952.
sentences.chinese: 從1952年起，軍事強人就統治埃及。

sentences.english: His father, Piye, had returned the true pharaonic customs to Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 他的父親，皮耶，將真正的法老傳統帶回了埃及。

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
